casebody.data:
Laurine HEISTER, as Administratrix of the Goods, Chattels, and Credits of Charles A. Heister, Deceased, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. LEHIGH & NEW ENGLAND RAILROAD COMPANY, Defendant-Appellant. No. 301. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Feb. 19, 1934. See, also, 50 F.(2d) 028. Smyth & Smyth, Jr., of New York City (Herbert C. Smyth and James B. Mackie, both of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Thomas J. O’Neill, of New York City (William J. Ilogan, of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before MANTON, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed.
